article.headline: Amazon.com Inc. stock falls Thursday, underperforms market
article.body: Shares of Amazon.com Inc. AMZN, +3.01% shed 0.16% to $3,190.55 Thursday, on what proved to be an all-around positive trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index SPX, +0.87% rising 0.80% to 3,446.83 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% rising 0.43% to 28,425.51. Amazon.com Inc. closed $361.70 below its 52-week high ($3,552.25), which the company reached on September 2nd. The stock underperformed when compared to some of its competitors Thursday, as Microsoft Corp. MSFT, +2.48% rose 0.36% to $210.58, Alphabet Inc. Cl A GOOGL, +1.82% rose 1.66% to $1,483.43, and Walmart Inc. WMT, +1.00% rose 0.33% to $141.36. Trading volume (3.1 M) remained 1.6 million below its 50-day average volume of 4.7 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights using data from Dow Jones and FactSet. See our market data terms of use.
